name: CRIMEHOT #1 - THE GAME
description:
A new on-going sci-fi caper comedy by Alec Robbins (creator of MR. BOOP)!

CRIMEHOT is about hot thieves in a crazy future where the human race was guided by an all-knowing Algorithm to leave Earth behind and colonize the depths of outer space and okay that's all boring. That all sucks. Stop worrying about that. Let's talk about how Haze is the greatest thief that has ever lived and how cool that is...

Experience the first issue of CRIMEHOT in VIDEO GAME FORM!! This book-reading simulator game was fully designed by PATRICK CROTTY and it's extremely cool and I'm so excited you can choose to read the comic this way!

FOR PC & MAC COMPUTERS

Game Designed by PATRICK CROTTY
3D Art Assets by AUGUST SMITH
Music by ESPer99

You can buy a physical copy of CRIMEHOT #1 HERE.
